languages.text: {n}Голос Висиря исполнен скорби — и смирения.{/n} "Да. Ибо я сильнее тебя. И со мной мои высшие ткачи — те, кто принес обет хранить меня и не умереть позже меня. И со мной — Он. Лик Его проступит сквозь мой. С тобой же да пребудут те, кого выбрала ты, ступая по нити Паутины. Твои товарищи. Тво{mf|й|я} Домин. И ты бейся. Бейся без сожалений". {n}Горький вздох срывается со старческих уст.{/n} "Прощай, дочь моя. Почтим Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Висиря исполнен скорби — и смирения.{/n} "Да. Ибо я сильнее тебя. И со мной мои высшие ткачи — те, кто принес обет хранить меня и не умереть позже меня. И со мной — Он. Лик Его проступит сквозь мой. С тобой же да пребудут те, кого выбрала ты, ступая по нити Паутины. Твои товарищи. Тво{mf|й|я} Домин. И ты бейся. Бейся без сожалений". {n}Горький вздох срывается со старческих уст.{/n} "Прощай, дочь моя. Почтим Неумирающего".

languages.text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Висиря исполнен скорби — и смирения.{/n} "Да. Ибо я сильнее тебя. И со мной мои высшие ткачи — те, кто принес обет хранить меня и не умереть позже меня. И со мной — Он. Лик Его проступит сквозь мой. С тобой же да пребудут те, кого выбрала ты, ступая по нити Паутины. Твои товарищи. Тво{mf|й|я} Домин. И ты бейся. Бейся без сожалений". {n}Горький вздох срывается со старческих уст.{/n} "Прощай, дочь моя. Почтим Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

{n}The Vizsier smiles sadly.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high weavers stand with me: those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those who you chose when you set out on the way of Ahn'shini, your comrades, your Enim — may they stand with you. Fight, my daughter. Fight with no regret." {n}The old man's smile fades from his lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

languages.text: {n}La voix du vizir est empreinte de chagrin et d'humilité.{/n} « Oui. Car enfin, je suis plus fort que vous. Et mes hauts tisseurs sont à mes côtés, eux qui ont juré de me protéger au péril de leur vie. Sans oublier qu'Il m'apporte Lui aussi Son auguste soutien. Son visage se manifestera à travers le mien. Quant à vos camarades, votre Domin, tous ceux que vous avez choisis en vous lançant sur les fils de la Toile, puissent-ils eux aussi vous épauler dans votre combat. Battez-vous. Battez-vous sans regret aucun. » {n}Un soupir amer s'échappe des lèvres du vieil homme.{/n} « Adieu, ma fille. Rendons un dernier hommage à l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

Et mes hauts tisseurs sont à mes côtés, eux qui ont juré de me protéger au péril de leur vie. Sans oublier qu'Il m'apporte Lui aussi Son auguste soutien. Son visage se manifestera à travers le mien. Quant à vos camarades, votre Domin, tous ceux que vous avez choisis en vous lançant sur les fils de la Toile, puissent-ils eux aussi vous épauler dans votre combat. Battez-vous. Battez-vous sans regret aucun. » {n}Un soupir amer s'échappe des lèvres du vieil homme.{/n} « Adieu, ma fille. Rendons un dernier hommage à l'Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}La voz del Visir está llena de pesar y humildad.{/n} «Sí, porque soy más fuerte que tú. Y mis altos tejedores están conmigo, pues han jurado protegerme y no vivir más que yo. Y Él también está conmigo. Su rostro emergerá del mío. Y que aquellos a los que elegiste al comenzar tu camino por los hilos de la Red: tus camaradas, tu Domin, estén contigo. Lucha. Lucha sin remordimientos». {n}El anciano profiere un suspiro amargo.{/n} «Adiós, hija mía. Déjanos venerar al Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Visir está llena de pesar y humildad.{/n} «Sí, porque soy más fuerte que tú. Y mis altos tejedores están conmigo, pues han jurado protegerme y no vivir más que yo. Y Él también está conmigo. Su rostro emergerá del mío. Y que aquellos a los que elegiste al comenzar tu camino por los hilos de la Red: tus camaradas, tu Domin, estén contigo. Lucha. Lucha sin remordimientos». {n}El anciano profiere un suspiro amargo.{/n} «Adiós, hija mía. Déjanos venerar al Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは穏やかに、そして悲しそうに話す。{/n}「あぁ、私はお前より強いからな。我が上級の織り手も私と共にいる。私を守り、そして私より先に散っていくと誓いを立てた者達だ。そしてあの方もまた私と共におられる。あの方の顔が私の顔に浮かぶだろう。そして、お前がウェブの糸に従って旅立つときに選んだ者達、お前の同志、そしてお前のドミン…彼らがお前と共に立ち上がらんことを。戦うのだ。悔いなく戦え」{n}老いた男の唇から辛そうな吐息が漏れる。{/n}「さらばだ、娘よ。不死の者を讃えようではないか」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは穏やかに、そして悲しそうに話す。{/n}「あぁ、私はお前より強いからな。我が上級の織り手も私と共にいる。私を守り、そして私より先に散っていくと誓いを立てた者達だ。そしてあの方もまた私と共におられる。あの方の顔が私の顔に浮かぶだろう。そして、お前がウェブの糸に従って旅立つときに選んだ者達、お前の同志、そしてお前のドミン…彼らがお前と共に立ち上がらんことを。戦うのだ。悔いなく戦え」{n}老いた男の唇から辛そうな吐息が漏れる。{/n}「さらばだ、娘よ。不死の者を讃えようではないか」

languages.text: {n}宿老的声音充满了谦卑与悲伤。{/n}“确实不公平，因为我比你更加强大。我的高阶织网者与我同在，他们发誓会保护我，绝不会让我死在他们之前。除此之外，祂也与我同在，祂的面容会通过我的脸显现出来。愿你在旅途中选择的那些人——愿你的战友、你的秘者与你同在。战斗吧，完成这场无悔无憾的战斗吧。”{n}老人口中发出了痛苦的叹息。{/n}“永别了，我的女儿，让我们向不死之神献上敬意吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老的声音充满了谦卑与悲伤。{/n}“确实不公平，因为我比你更加强大。我的高阶织网者与我同在，他们发誓会保护我，绝不会让我死在他们之前。除此之外，祂也与我同在，祂的面容会通过我的脸显现出来。愿你在旅途中选择的那些人——愿你的战友、你的秘者与你同在。战斗吧，完成这场无悔无憾的战斗吧。”{n}老人口中发出了痛苦的叹息。{/n}“永别了，我的女儿，让我们向不死之神献上敬意吧。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Wesirs ist voller Trauer und Demut.{/n} "Ja. Denn ich bin stärker als Ihr. Und meine Hoheweber stehen mir bei. Jene, die einen Eid geschworen haben, mich zu beschützen und nicht länger zu leben als ich. Und auch er steht mir bei. Sein Gesicht wird aus meinem heraus auftauchen. Und mögen jene, die Ihr wählt, wenn Ihr die Fäden des Netzes beschreitet, Eure Kameraden, Euer Domin ... mögen sie auch Euch beistehen. Kämpft. Kämpft ohne Reue." {n}Ein bitteres Seufzen fällt von den Lippen des alten Mannes.{/n} "Lebt wohl, meine Tochter. Ehren wir den Todlosen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."

Jene, die einen Eid geschworen haben, mich zu beschützen und nicht länger zu leben als ich. Und auch er steht mir bei. Sein Gesicht wird aus meinem heraus auftauchen. Und mögen jene, die Ihr wählt, wenn Ihr die Fäden des Netzes beschreitet, Eure Kameraden, Euer Domin ... mögen sie auch Euch beistehen. Kämpft. Kämpft ohne Reue." {n}Ein bitteres Seufzen fällt von den Lippen des alten Mannes.{/n} "Lebt wohl, meine Tochter. Ehren wir den Todlosen."

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in sesi, kasvet ve tevazuyla dolu.{/n} "Evet çünkü ben senden daha güçlüyüm. Ayrıca beni korumak ve benden uzun yaşamamak için ant içen yüksek dokurlarım da yanımda. O da benimle birlikte. Benim yüzümün yerini O'nun yüzü alacak. Ağ'ın iplikleri boyunca uzanan yola baş koyduğunda seçtiklerin, yoldaşların, Domin'in... Onlar da senin yanında olsun. Dövüş. Pişmanlık bilmeden dövüş." {n}İhtiyar adamın dudaklarından acı dolu bir iç çekiş duyuluyor.{/n} "Elveda kızım. Ölmeyen'i onurlandıralım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier's voice is full of sorrow and humility.{/n} "Yes. For I am stronger than you. And my high spinners stand with me, those who swore an oath to protect me and not outlive me. And He, too, stands with me. His face will emerge out of mine. And may those you chose when you set out along the threads of the Web, your comrades, your Domin — may they stand with you. Fight. Fight with no regret." {n}A bitter sigh falls from the old man's lips.{/n} "Farewell, my daughter. Let us honour the Undying One."
